title: PR email mark-read to upstream CC4Me
description:
Push mark-as-read improvements to upstream CC4Me repo:
- graph.js: markAsRead() function, auto-mark on read, mark-read command
- jmap.js: markAsRead() function, auto-mark on read, mark-read command
- jmap.js: Fix unread filter (notKeyword instead of hasKeyword object)
- jmap.js: Fix empty query result handling in listInbox

Depends on a7a (merge upstream first to avoid conflicts).
nextStep: Complete a7a merge first, then create upstream PR
